select tabA.SubjectNo,tabA.APID,tabA.Level,tabA.IsChecked as SpreadStatus,tabA.IsChecked,tabA.PicFileUrl,tabA.PromotionApplyTime,tabA.PromotionConfirmTime,T.PreheatTime,T.StExpand ,S.SubjectName,S.IsPreheat,S.DateBegin,S.DateEnd,S.TitlePic1,S.BelongsSubjectPic ,B.BrandNo,B.BrandCnName,B.BrandEnName from SWfsSubjectApplyPromotion(NOLOCK) as tabA left outer join SWfsSubjectTopExpand(NOLOCK) as T on tabA.subjectNo=T.SubjectNo left outer join Swfssubject(NOLOCK) as S on tabA.SubjectNo=S.SubjectNo left outer join WfsBrand(NOLOCK) as B on CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), S.BrandContent)=B.BrandNo #if($CategoryNo !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef(NOLOCK) on S.SubjectNo=SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo where SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo=@CategoryNo and S.IsAudited=1 #end #if($CategoryNo =='') where 1=1 and S.IsAudited=1 #end
#if($KeyWord !='') and (S.SubjectName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or S.SubjectNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end
#if($BrandNo !='') and B.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end
#if($ApplyBeginTime !='') and tabA.PromotionApplyTime>=@ApplyBeginTime #end
#if($ApplyEndTime !='') and tabA.PromotionApplyTime<=@ApplyEndTime #end
#if($SpreadStatus !='') and tabA.IsChecked=@SpreadStatus #end
#if($Level !='') and tabA.Level=@Level #end
#if($SubjectType!='') and S.SubjectTemplate=@SubjectType #end

select SWfsSubjectProductRef.SubjectProductRefId, SWfsSubjectProductRef.PropertyValue, SWfsSubjectProductRef.TopFlag, SWfsSubjectProductRef.SortNo, SWfsSubjectProductRef.BuyType, SWfsSubjectProductRef.IsStarProduct, SWfsSubjectProductRef.ShowTime, SWfsSubjectProductRef.IsShow, WfsProduct.ProductNo, WfsProduct.ProductName, WfsProduct.ProductPicFile, WfsProduct.GoodsNo, WfsProduct.MarketPrice, WfsProduct.SellPrice, WfsProduct.PlatinumPrice, WfsProduct.DiamondPrice, WfsProduct.LimitedPrice, WfsProduct.LimitedVipPrice, WfsProduct.IsShelf, WfsProduct.DepartmentNo, WfsBrand.BrandNo, WfsBrand.BrandCnName, WfsBrand.BrandEnName, WfsProduct.DiscountRate from SWfsSubjectProductRef with(nolock) inner join WfsProduct with(nolock) on SWfsSubjectProductRef.ProductNo = WfsProduct.ProductNo inner join WfsBrand with(nolock) on WfsProduct.BrandNo=WfsBrand.BrandNo where SWfsSubjectProductRef.CategoryNo in @SCategoryNo and SWfsSubjectProductRef.TypeFlag=0
#if($CategoryNo !='') and WfsProduct.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($IsShelf!='') and IsShelf =@IsShelf #end #if($BrandNo!='') and WfsProduct.BrandNo =@BrandNo #end #if($Keyword!='') and (ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or WfsProduct.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or GoodsNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($GenderStyle!='') and WfsProduct.GenderStyle = @GenderStyle #end order by SortNo ASC,SWfsSubjectProductRef.DateCreate DESC

select tabA.SubjectNo,tabA.APID,tabA.Level,tabA.IsChecked as SpreadStatus,tabA.IsChecked,tabA.PicFileUrl,tabA.PromotionApplyTime,tabA.PromotionConfirmTime,T.PreheatTime,T.StExpand,tabA.SubjectSalesHot,tabA.ProductInfo,tabA.OtherDescription,tabA.PromotionChannelNo,tabA.SeoTitle,tabA.SeoKeyWords,tabA.SeoDescription ,S.SubjectName,S.IsPreheat,S.DateBegin,S.DateEnd,S.TitlePic1,S.BelongsSubjectPic ,B.BrandNo,B.BrandCnName,B.BrandEnName from SWfsSubjectApplyPromotion(NOLOCK) as tabA left outer join SWfsSubjectTopExpand(NOLOCK) as T on tabA.subjectNo=T.SubjectNo left outer join Swfssubject(NOLOCK) as S on tabA.SubjectNo=S.SubjectNo left outer join WfsBrand(NOLOCK) as B on CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), S.BrandContent)=B.BrandNo where S.IsAudited=1 and tabA.SubjectNo=@SubjectNo
select * from SWfsSubjectPromotionChannel(nolock) order by CreateDateTime asc

SELECT sub.[SubjectNo] , sub.[SubjectName] , sub.[TitlePic1] , sub.[TitlePic2] , sub.[DateBegin] , sub.[DateEnd] , sub.[BelongsSubjectPic] , sub.[VisitCount] , sub.[DiscountType] , sub.[DiscountTypeValue] , sub.[ContentIntorType] , sub.[ContentRecommended] , sub.[ContentRecommType] , sub.[SubjectTemplate] , sub.[FlapPic] , sub.[Gender] , sub.[DateCreate] , sub.[Status] , sub.[IPhonePic] , sub.BrandContent , sub.BU, b.BrandNo AS BrandSign, b.BrandLogo , b.BrandCnName , b.BrandEnName , sub.[SalesForecast] FROM [SWfsSubject] (NOLOCK) AS sub LEFT OUTER JOIN WfsBrand (NOLOCK) AS B ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), sub.BrandContent) = b.BrandNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef on sub.SubjectNo=SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo #end where sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.SubjectTemplate !=5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 and sub.IsAudited=1 and DATEDIFF(day,@StartDate, sub.DateBegin)=0 AND sub.DateEnd > getdate() #if($ChannelSord !='') and SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo=@ChannelSord #end #if($SubjectNameNo !='') and (sub.SubjectName like '%'+@SubjectNameNo+ '%' or sub.SubjectNo like '%'+@SubjectNameNo+ '%') #end #if($BU!='') and sub.BU=@BU #end #if($BrandNo !='') and B.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end ORDER BY sub.DateBegin DESC ,sub.DateCreate DESC

SELECT sub.[SubjectNo] , sub.[SubjectName] , sub.[TitlePic1] , sub.[TitlePic2] , sub.[DateBegin] , sub.[DateEnd] , sub.[BelongsSubjectPic] , sub.[VisitCount] , sub.[DiscountType] , sub.[DiscountTypeValue] , sub.[ContentIntorType] , sub.[ContentRecommended] , sub.[ContentRecommType] , sub.[SubjectTemplate] , sub.[FlapPic] , sub.[Gender] , sub.[DateCreate] , sub.[Status] , sub.[IPhonePic] , sub.BrandContent , sub.BU, b.BrandNo AS BrandSign, e.BrandLogo , b.BrandCnName , b.BrandEnName , sub.[SalesForecast] FROM [SWfsSubject] (NOLOCK) AS sub LEFT OUTER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) AS b ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), sub.BrandContent) = b.BrandNo inner join SpBrandExtend (NOLOCK) AS e on e.BrandNo = b.BrandNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef on sub.SubjectNo=SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo #end where sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.SubjectTemplate !=5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited=1 AND sub.DateBegin < @StartDate AND sub.DateEnd > @EndDate #if($ChannelSord !='') and SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo=@ChannelSord #end #if($SubjectNameNo !='') and (sub.SubjectName like '%'+@SubjectNameNo+ '%' or sub.SubjectNo like '%'+@SubjectNameNo+ '%') #end #if($BU!='') and sub.BU=@BU #end #if($BrandNo !='') and B.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end #if($QueryStartTime!='') and CONVERT(varchar(50),sub.DateBegin,23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50),@QueryStartTime,23) #end #if($QueryEndTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),sub.DateBegin,23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50),@QueryEndTime,23) #end
select * from SWfsSubjectSort(nolock) where Type=@Type and ChannelNo=@ChannelNo and SubjectNo=@SubjectNo
